comments: Nice app. Very useful. My one more suggestion is please add some sound (male/female/binaural) for Hold. Sure it will help more. Thank you so much developer team. Sure I will suggest to my friends😊🙏❤️
the only good breathing app. excellent, easy to use, intuitive. very powerful.

Works very well for HRV biofeedback paced breathing. Simple and easy and the visual and sound cues are crisp and make it easy to know exactly when to start and stop each inhale, exhale and pause. The only issue is the blue color which can interfere with sleep. A warmer color scheme would also be easier on the eyes at night.

The app is Nice but no update in 5 years??!!!!! And why can't I download some breathing profiles/schemes? For example some pranayama or some holotropic breathing. Maybe some other sound available? What if I want to rename a breathing profile for save it when I change smartphone? Nothing! I mean it's still a valid app but no one behind it. No updates no improvements. I'll change my review as soon as the developer want to show up./ I purchased the app like 4 years ago, I paid for pro version and I didn't see any improvement. Unfortunately.

Great app. One of the best I've tried. I rely on the vibrate feature. (The voices and sounds are otherwise very distracting). The vibrate is not working on my pixel 2 xl anymore. Not sure if it was an update from you or something else but without the vibrate feature working I can't really use it anymore.

title: Talking Ginger 2
description:
Ginger's Birthday - It’s time for some birthday fun!

Talking Ginger, the cutest little kitten, is growing up and wants you to celebrate his birthday with him. :-)

Join him for the best party ever - with awesome food and loads of games! Yes, you’re invited to hang out with the most adorable kitten in the world!

FEATURES:
- Talk to Ginger: Speak and he will repeat what you say in his cute voice.
- Play with Ginger: Cuddle, tickle or poke Ginger to see his funny reactions.
- Eat with Ginger: Feed him snacks or use the special 'meal time' button to eat together.
- Record Ginger: Record videos of Ginger having fun and share them with your friends.
- Celebrate with Ginger: Blow the party whistle for as long as you can.
- Play the mini-game: See how many birthday candles you can blow out before the timer runs out.
- Win free snacks: Get a free spin of the Fortune Wheel every 24 hours, or earn snacks within the app.
- Unlock rewards: Keep playing with Ginger to unlock more than 50 different jigsaw puzzle images.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child’s personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and contextual advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- The option to make in-app purchases

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/

comments: Warning for all parents out there, when your 4 year old downloads this game, because it pops up as an ad on a different game, and purchases $10.71 outfit7 will tell you that per their terms and conditions they won't refund your money......ya know because the 4 year old definitely read the terms and conditions 🙄
This is so annoying. We spend more time clicking on ads that enjoy the game. So bloody hell. Shame for this app! I give it 0 out of 10 for usefulness
I Love this Game so much And The puzzle never Watch ADS In Talking Angela,s Sticker Album But This Is Not My Talking Angela Is Talking Ginger 2
Fun to play and record but adds are too irritating

The best thing about this app is that in 1 app, there are many many games! This is not only a talking game, also having a candle-blow game. We have to blow the candles otherwise they will go down. My bro is of 5 months and he loves this game and stops crying after watching her talking. I appreciate the team of Outfit 7 for making such an amazing app.

title: Superapp
description:
Super App es una aplicación pensada y diseñada para que los niños con síndrome de Down jueguen y aprendan realizando las compras en el supermercado.

Mediante un método sencillo, donde prevalece el pensamiento concreto, el usuario aprenderá jugando. Captando su atención, podrá desplegar todo su potencial, estimulando el autovalimiento y la adquisición de un saber que lo nivelará con los niños de su edad.

Incluye una aplicación para realizar la lista de compras y dos juegos didácticos asociados a dicha temática. Mediante la carga de imágenes, es posible personalizar los elementos de la lista de compras, para poder incluir elementos de la vida cotidiana del niño, y de esta forma facilitar su aprendizaje.

La inclusión es el fin último y primario de esta aplicación, motivando al niño a participar y ayudar a sus padres en las compras cotidianas del hogar.

Este software fue desarrollado como trabajo final de grado por alumnos de la Facultad de Ingeniería de la Universidad de Buenos Aires, en conjunto con el Lic. Daniel Egea (Psicólogo Clínico especialista en niños y adolescentes), en el marco del Proyecto Dane.

Play the formula car robot game and dragon robot car game that classifies the multiple transforming robots in newest gameplay of robot wars. Land into flying robots battlefield to survive till last and prove yourself lone saviour of the modern world.

Empower your advanced battle machines of mech robot games in one of best robot transforming games, robot shooting games and flying dragon robot games. You can fly around by transforming into dragon robots to shoot down enemy dragons with fireballs. In all three robot transformations, your mech robot is powerful enough to tackle all the attacking enemies alone. As we are fully aware of user attractions towards transforming robot wars with multiple super robot powers, we kept in mind every aspect of user choice to equip our robots with destructive capabilities in this flying dragon game. This game is amazing and the best robot game i have ever seen..its graphics and features are excellent and it is full of fun game.

Wow Dragon robot car is so nice and fantastic game its sound and graphics is so nice you can change the cars in to robots

title: Bowling Crew — 3D bowling game
description:
Join 10 000 000 community and play Bowling Crew – The World’s #1 3D bowling game!

Challenge your friends or play 1v1 matches with worthy opponents from all over the world. This is the best choice for bowling fans and one of the most popular mobile games of all time!

Switch between fascinating bowling balls to knock down all ten pins and get a strike! Win epic PvP-battles to gain rewards. Level up to win even more bowling matches and climb to the top of this free, fun multiplayer game.

Wargaming brings you legendary online multiplayer games to play with your like-minded friends.

Bowling Crew features:

INSTANT MATCHES
We will quickly find you a skill-appropriate opponent. Every match lasts no longer than 3 minutes. No more waiting – play online anytime, anywhere.

CHALLENGE OF THE DAY
Test your skills on alleys with nonstandard rules every day. Show everyone how you're rolling!

SEASONS
Every two weeks you have an opportunity to participate in a competitive season with unique prizes. Win matches, gather tokens and collect season rewards!

FANTASTIC GRAPHICS
We take special care of graphics. Our breathtaking alleys will dive you in a fascinating atmosphere of one of iconic world epochs (often, not real).

AND MORE!
-revolutionary gameplay, which is easy to learn and difficult to master;
-millions of players, who are waiting to be challenged;
-11 unique 3D bowling alleys and 49 striking balls;
-weekly leagues, where you can advance and unlock new bowling balls;
-easter eggs, that are hidden in every bowling lane – try to find them all;
-quick-fire real-time PvP multiplayer, which allows you compete with best bowling players;

Welcome to Bowling Crew! Compete with your friends for the ‘KING OF BOWLING’ title.
First sports game from World of Tanks Blitz and World of Warships Blitz creators.

SUPPORT
In case you’ve faced any issues or some have some questions, do not hesitate to contact us:
E-mail support@bowlingcrew.com
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/bowlingcrewgame
YouTube https://www.youtube.com/BowlingCrew
Discord: https://discord.gg/Hb2w6r5

The game requires Internet connection.

recentChanges:
New season starts now! Here is the news:

- More rewards for happy owners of the Season Pass.
- Improvements in the currency balance. One of them is that you need chips instead of gold for additional attempts in the Challenge of the Day now.

Good luck on the lanes!
comments: There is far too much luck and not enough strategy in this game. One can use the same level balls, lined up on the same dot, pointed in the same direction, on the same alley, use the same swing; and one week you get strikes or 9s. Next week, tons of splits. The flower pin arrangement is a very good example. The game does not reward figuring out strategy. It also does not provide enough opportunities to upgrade balls. It also does a poor job of pairing u against opponents with same ball level.

Fun! All free for me so far. Update: I still really enjoy playing this game. The graphics are incredible and the ways the balls, pins and alleys interact seems to be 100% true to the laws of physics. Sometimes I'll get startled by the ball or pins shooting back in my face or I'll burst out in a laugh when something unexpected happens. This is still one of my go-to games even when I'm losing.

Your game is the best bowling, most realistic and I used to bowl pro. But it freezes up constantly. Its really frustrating when your bowling for 6,000. I've probably lost 15,000 easy. Please fix the freezing! The lower right side still freezes my stick. I like the changes, however, the one u call Rabbit, 2configuration of 5 pins. These games r to challenge yourself.the only way to get a strike is by accident. Please change the one, no fun.

This app is filled with a bunch of bots. The whole system is rigged. What a disappointment. The balls don't get any better. How I know it's rigged and you aren't playing against live players is try and forfeit in the last frame beforeit even begins. Miraculously it shows the other persons score over those 3 frames when there wasn't even enough time to bowl those 3 frames. Rigged!!!

The game is very nice to play, however, when and if you purchase certain items, they don't tell you that if you don't have that particular ball in play you have to WAIT until that ball Opens up for you. Therefore, you purchased something that may not be available to you when you purchase it! So you have to keep playing, just to see your purchased item! NOT GOOD.

title: Upper Body Training - Chest, Arms & Back Workout
description:
Challenge your Arms, Chest, Shoulders, Upper back and other upper body muscles in a few minutes. Push-Ups are not the only exercise for your upper body and so we provide you with 75 exercises targeting all muscles of your upper body. 

Upper Body Workouts by Fitify provides 6 unique workouts

• Complex Upper Body
• Arm Blaster
• Monster Chest
• Shoulders & Upper Back
• Stretch & Relief
• Push-Ups Only

Features

• over 75 bodyweight exercises
• 6 unique workout programs
• no equipment needed (bench or char is recommended)
• voice coach
• clear HD video demonstrations
• designed for men and women, young or old
• works offline

Custom Workouts
Build your own workout with custom workouts. Choose exercises, duration, rest intervals and challenge yourself with your own training. With Fitify you have one custom workout for free.

Adaptable difficulty
We adjust your training level up or down based on your feedback.

Fitify Apps
Be stronger, leaner, healthier with Fitify – your very own personal trainer.
Check out other Fitify bodyweight apps: (Abs & Core, Legs & Butt, Warmup & Cooldown)
Or apps with fitness tools (such as TRX, Kettlebell, Swiss Ball, Foam Roller, Bosu or Resistance band).

comments: A good range of exercises, a few different target areas that you can work on. You can change the amount of time that you workout for and ads only appear once you have finished so your routine isn't interrupted.
Good App the UI is responsive. The routines are absolute torture, which is excellent for those who want to challenge themselves :-). I used other workout apps before but Fitify is better.

I think that this and other apps in the range really do provide an easy way to have a regular pre-determined work out set out for you to do. It removes the anxiety and stress of having to do it yourself. Videos and explanations of the exercises would be a great addition.
love this app, really easy and straightforward, adjusts to your level and plenty of excercises

Great exercises. I started using this suite of apps just a couple weeks ago, so I have yet to SEE results. I do, however, FEEL the results! I really appreciate the difficulty rating at the end of a session. Instead of guessing what level I should be attempting, I try a routine, rate it at the end, and enjoy a more tailored session next time. That is great! I would give it 5 stars, but the app does not connect to Fit regularly. Usually, only the first session in a day is recorded.

title: Wire • Secure Messenger
description:
Wire is the most secure collaboration platform. We increase the productivity in your team while keeping your information private. Wire allows your team to communicate and share information easily and securely - messages, files, conference calls or private conversations - always in context.

 – Communicate with your teams through private or group conversations
 – Share and collaborate with files, documents, links with reactions
 – Press the one-click conference call button and your voice or video meetings starts on time
 – Invite partners, customers and suppliers  to collaborate through the unique guest rooms
 – Increase privacy through ephemeral messages and device fingerprinting
 – Integrate Wire with your corporate applications and services
 – Recognized by IDC as industry leading security and privacy  approach through Open Source, end to end encryption, forward secrecy and public audits

Wire is available on any device and operating system - so your team can collaborate whether in the office or on the road.

Wire is also available as an on-demand solution for crisis collaboration.

Wire offers a free version for external business partners or friends and family use.

To learn more go to wire.com

recentChanges:
Fixed:
- Sending very small files fail
- Flash button is present when taking pictures in selfie mode
comments: Wire is great,I use it all the time and it helps be connected with others. My only problem with the app is the fact you can't delete contacts which is quite annoying, I know you can just block and clear them but it isn't that efficient. Please try and fix this as soon as possible. Else this is the best chat app I have ever used. Oh and I recognised a new fault in it, When using the app or web app. It takes time to load on older computers and pcs which takes hours to load due the security.

It's nice that the security is good but if a IM app takes ages to send message even on high speed internet that's saddening, the webclients or even the desktop app takes ages to deliver the message in the group, that need to be fixed. In mobile app to the caching of app state is buggy, and hide content on app switch dosent work, all it does is just shows the older app state. there are many more bugs but for the time being it that's the most I want to write. And add a feature to unfriend.

Consistently tells me I don't have internet even though I do. Sends messages out of order, sometimes hours or even days later, if it sends them at all. Not sure what happened, been using it for a while and it used to be fine. Super frustrating when you're trying to carry on a conversation.

After a while, the sound of one of the interlocutors disappears during a voice conversation if you turn off the screen or switch to another application. But the sound returns if you switch back to Wire.

For some reason one of my chat groups that does show up on my desktop does not show up on the phone app, I've attempted many times to solve this problem and still have not figured out why it's missing. Otherwise the app is fine, but I do feel it lacks some of the features that you get from keybase and that app was free. Unfortunately the PRC owns KB now so I can't trust it.

title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
description:
Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your  favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017’s brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!

Your phone thirsts for battle!

Features: 

1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles 
Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy’s tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy 
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory 
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master 
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart’s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches 
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance 
In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you’re offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.

PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.

Contact Us 
You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:

Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.com
Instagram: @mobilelegendsgame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA

developerAddress: UNIT 17, 9/F, TOWER A, NEW MADARIN PLAZA, No. 14 SCIENCE MUSEUM RD, TST, KL
recentChanges:
1. New Hero: [Dino Rider] - Barats, the Desert King who can absorb energy and become bigger, will be available in September. Stay tuned!
2. New Mode [Mirror Mayhem] is coming! As a combination of Mirror Mode with Mayhem Mode, this super entertaining mode is about nothing but Fun! Get ready for the new mode!
3. New Little Commander - Yuki, the Snow Witch, has been introduced to the Magic Chess.
comments: The game itself is fun and addicting. You can meet new people even if it is online, play with friends and family etc. I like how the battles are challenging, but everytime I play it, it kicks me out the loading screen. I don't know how to deal with this, everytime I get back to play ML my credit score is low because of the lag. Please fix this Moontoon! :'(

In the past, I had issue with the game lagging on me, but ever sice the month of October of 2020, its going very well with here and there lags. So far, things are going well, minus the loading the game but. It starts to load but completely stops when loading other players. I can always exit the app out and load it back in. But by the time you do, the game started and you are behind. It's worse when you are playing Brawl. This bug really do need to be fixed.

Mobile Legends is a fun moba game that has many amazing characters, different modes and pretty good features. The game functions pretty well and has been continuously getting better thanks to the developers being active towards the community of this game. The developer also have been patching,updating and informing the community on the big events, issues and other information that need to be addressed. Overall give this game a try and see how you feel about it, but I enjoy playing this game!

I use to enjoy playing with this game for 2 years but after so many updates its become annoying. I always lose my resounces even though I did not erase it from my file. I tried many tricks to fix it, but didn't works at all. The only way to fix it is to download data again. Now I'm tired of downloading it again and the only choice is to uninstall it.

This game was fine, but when I play the game I always get teamed up with players who couldn't understand me. Result of it I get lose streak. You should fix this problem or make something out of it because it is very annoying. I'm from the Philippines but my teams are always from Indonesia or Mongolia. Fix this or I'm switching to League of legends: Wildrift.

title: Give It Up!
description:
Feel the Rhythm. Jump or Smear. Give It Up.

GIVE IT UP is a rather hard game where you have to assist this cheerful, singing Blob in jumping through 18 different tracks.
Single tap control - sounds easy right?
You have to feel the rhythm as Blob jumps up, over and down with the help of the similarly crazy music.
Beware, if you don't tap at the right time, poor Blob will smear before you can cry Nooo and throw your device away.

Who will love it?
• Those who love challenges
• Those who enjoy sweating during the game
• Those who can feel the rhytm
• Those who feel up to it
• Those who don't fear for their devices

Who will hate it?
• EVERYONE

Give It Up! Anniversary Update

- Complete graphics overhaul
- Automatic cloud backup
- 9 new very tough stages have been added for a total of 36
- Daily Challenge difficulty can now be selected
- Checkpoints have been placed for every stage

comments: Full of ads and it wasn't like this before. Game itself hasn't changed and it's still fun & good. But ads shows up so often, it's interfering with the game play(It's like ads7 : game2 : loading1). Also for some reasons it keeps signing me off from Google play account so I constantly have to sign in and even I do sign in, it doesn't really sign me into my account, it signs me in as a random level 3 user. Makes me worried if it'll save the progress.
Excellent game. Challenging, good rhythm and great for passing time... Requires good concentration span.
Good game but how I save my progress or all characters are paid. No any free of cost.
It glitches the first time I start the app each time.
Just downloaded it... started it... and after it nearly killed my ears with awful tttzzzzzz sound while in the menu, i'm done with this trash too.

title: Adobe Premiere Rush — Video Editor
description:
Shoot, edit, and share online videos anywhere.

Feed your channels a steady stream of awesome with Adobe Premiere Rush, the all-in-one, cross-device video editor. Powerful tools let you quickly create videos that look and sound professional, just how you want. Share to your favorite social sites right from the app and work across devices. Use it free as long as you want with unlimited exports — or upgrade to access all premium features and hundreds of soundtracks, sound effects, loops, animated titles, overlays, and graphics.

Add music and titles to videos and apply video effects to clips in your multitrack timeline with the video editor used by influencers, vloggers, and pros. Crop videos to customize and share to your favorite social sites, including YouTube, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok, right from the app.

PRO-QUALITY VIDEO
Built-in professional camera functionality lets you capture high-quality content right from the app and start video editing immediately.

EASY EDITING AND VIDEO EFFECTS
Arrange video, audio, graphics, and photos with drag and drop. Trim and crop videos, adjust video speed with speed controls, and enhance color with intuitive presets and customization tools.
Create pan and zoom effects for images with one click to make your videos pop.

CUSTOMIZE ANIMATED TITLES
Access built-in animated graphics such as titles and overlays. Change the color, size, font, and more to make them yours.

GREAT SOUND
Add music to videos, hundreds of original soundtracks, sound effects, and loops to bring them to life.

MULTITRACK TIMELINE TO EDIT VIDEOS
Enjoy creative flexibility with multiple video tracks to achieve impressive effects like picture-in-picture and split-view.

MADE FOR SHARING
Crop videos for social. Easily resize videos from landscape to portrait to square for different channels. Add a thumbnail, schedule your post, and publish to TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube. Portrait, 4:5, landscape, and square aspect ratios are supported. With 4:5, all media in a sequence is automatically resized — ideal for Facebook and Instagram.

PREMIUM USERS
Upgrade to Rush Premium to access all features and content, including:

ADVANCED AUDIO TOOLS
Advanced tools powered by Adobe Sensei AI for sound balancing and auto-ducking.

PREMIUM CONTENT LIBRARY
Unlock hundreds of premium titles, overlays, and animated graphics to elevate your videos.

ADDITIONAL PREMIUM FEATURES
Auto reframe automatically detects and keeps the most important part of your videos in the frame when switching to different aspect ratios – perfect for sharing to social media. 
Advanced sharing automatically updates edits across all your mobile devices, and exporting in 4K is supported.

NEW RUSH UPDATES
Discovering, browsing and adding new content to clips is easier than ever with the new graphics and audio browser.

descriptionHTML:
Shoot, edit, and share online videos anywhere.

Feed your channels a steady stream of awesome with Adobe Premiere Rush, the all-in-one, cross-device video editor. Powerful tools let you quickly create videos that look and sound professional, just how you want. Share to your favorite social sites right from the app and work across devices. Use it free as long as you want with unlimited exports — or upgrade to access all premium features and hundreds of soundtracks, sound effects, loops, animated titles, overlays, and graphics.

Add music and titles to videos and apply video effects to clips in your multitrack timeline with the video editor used by influencers, vloggers, and pros. Crop videos to customize and share to your favorite social sites, including YouTube, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok, right from the app.

PRO-QUALITY VIDEO
Built-in professional camera functionality lets you capture high-quality content right from the app and start video editing immediately.

EASY EDITING AND VIDEO EFFECTS
Arrange video, audio, graphics, and photos with drag and drop. Trim and crop videos, adjust video speed with speed controls, and enhance color with intuitive presets and customization tools.
Create pan and zoom effects for images with one click to make your videos pop.

CUSTOMIZE ANIMATED TITLES
Access built-in animated graphics such as titles and overlays. Change the color, size, font, and more to make them yours.

GREAT SOUND
Add music to videos, hundreds of original soundtracks, sound effects, and loops to bring them to life.

MULTITRACK TIMELINE TO EDIT VIDEOS
Enjoy creative flexibility with multiple video tracks to achieve impressive effects like picture-in-picture and split-view.

MADE FOR SHARING
Crop videos for social. Easily resize videos from landscape to portrait to square for different channels. Add a thumbnail, schedule your post, and publish to TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube. Portrait, 4:5, landscape, and square aspect ratios are supported. With 4:5, all media in a sequence is automatically resized — ideal for Facebook and Instagram.

PREMIUM USERS
Upgrade to Rush Premium to access all features and content, including:

ADVANCED AUDIO TOOLS
Advanced tools powered by Adobe Sensei AI for sound balancing and auto-ducking.

PREMIUM CONTENT LIBRARY
Unlock hundreds of premium titles, overlays, and animated graphics to elevate your videos.

ADDITIONAL PREMIUM FEATURES
Auto reframe automatically detects and keeps the most important part of your videos in the frame when switching to different aspect ratios – perfect for sharing to social media.
Advanced sharing automatically updates edits across all your mobile devices, and exporting in 4K is supported.

Discovering, browsing and adding new content to clips is easier than ever with the new graphics and audio browser.

comments: I really was liking this app, it makes things so much easier but then when I updated it and was trying to make something. After about 4 hours of editing the app suddenly stopped, crashed my phone and then deleted the prodject that has taken me a long time to make. That I was almost done with... I think there's major updates needed for this app so it can be stable on mobile phones.

Easy UI to edit. Simple on the go. Love it. However. Can't export anything. I've tried re encoding original files to various file types and retried exporting with no success. Using Samsung Note 10+. I've taken a screen recording to send thru the app. Unfortunately when I try attaching the file it also gives me an error that the file type is unsupported and it's only 20 MB file. A few things broken. Hopefully it gets updated and fixed. Would love use it.

After the Adobe MAX 2020, I am so excited to make my first video clip. However after I rendered it and try to play the video, it glitches all the way (like the camera is blinking eye instantly). Not sure is it because I'm using Android phone.. I see all the speakers who doing the demo, everything is so smooth... Hope this app could fix all the glitch and lagging and app crash issues in coming updates..

The app has always been great. But all those easy-to-use options are only useful if the app works properly without crashing and without constantly restarting my phone. Unfortunately, that's not the case. I seriously am disappointed because this used to be my go-to app for editing.

The program became worse overtime since the initial download. My videos take multiple attempts to export, export time is super slow for a short 2-3 min video. I like the app because it's nice to edit quick videos on my phone but what's the point of i record something and almost take an hour to be able to upload.

title: Readict - Free & Unlimited Romance Novels
description:
Readict – Read free and addicting novels that get you back into reading again. On Readict, our free online novels are feverishly exciting, wildly dramatic, and full of romantic adventures. Whether you're a love and romance fanatic, a fiction enthusiast, or just looking for something fun—there's always something for you to enjoy on Readict, absolutely FREE!

[About]
All novels in the Readict app are Free!
Expect frequent updates to satisfy your reading cravings!
The Readict app caters to your reading style and likes, with a huge selection of novels for you to choose from!


【Pregnant and Homeless】
Jakobia found herself in a sticky situation. Pregnant at 18, she was accused of cheating and got kicked out of home for repeating her mother's history. 
For six months she lived on the streets of America going from state to state and city to city until she met Billionaire Uvaldo Dakoda who wanted her to feel nothing but safe and protected from this cruel world. 
How can you live with a man as sweet as Uvaldo and not fall for him?
Will Uvaldo fall for the teen who he rescued from the street or will remain just her saviour?


【The Devil's Bride】
He leaned down, taking my chin in his hand, forcing me to look up into his blood-red eyes. His fangs were showing, dripping with the blood of my boyfriend who lay on the ground, lifeless.
"You are mine, Bast. You'd do well to remember that." He purred, as he licked the blood off his lips. "No other man make take your innocence, but me." he said, the desire in his eyes making me squirm.
"Yes, Damien." I whispered in response, covering myself in the sheet, and looking over at the body of Jacob with a whimper.
My name is Bast, I'm seventeen years old, soon to be eighteen. When I was twelve, my parents sold me to the devil. On my eighteenth birthday, he will come back for me.


【Not Rejected Just Unwanted】
All Raine Andrew wanted was a mate. She wanted a mate to love her and  make her feel wanted. And when she turns 17 she gets her mate, soon-to-be-Beta Elijah Woods. He’s a great guy. He’s loyal to his pack, straight A student, and a very hard worker.
He sounds like the perfect mate right? Raine thought so too, but there's just one problem. He doesn’t want her...


【The Runaway Breeder】
My life is thrown into a pit of despair when the Alpha decides to make me the pack breeder.
Today is a week from when the Alpha first started coming, and as I stare at the small stick in my hand, I cry, not because I'm happy, but because my life is over. Six months until this pup is born. Part of me is ashamed of how I acted over the last week with the Alpha. I cursed the doctor and his drug each time I was left alone in bed, when the Alpha left to do pack work, before he returned to make me his own little toy.


We are always committed to providing better service to our users. Feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions or suggestions about Readict at novelnew2020@gmail.com

recentChanges:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Enjoy stories in Readict!
comments: Love the app, however it would be better if you could read a whole book without having to wait on new chapters everyday, I love the werewolf stories, but another thing, if all the books in a series were placed together in order it would be much better, some I've read were out of order I believe, please think about putting them in order, also what's with the coins? It doesn't show how to use them in the app, mine are kinda just there

This is, in my opinion, the best of the free reading story apps. The writers tend to have less spelling and grammar errors compared to other apps. So far, there have only been 2 stories that I chose not to finish. My only complaint is if you want to reread a story you have to scroll all the way to the beginning. It doesn't automatically put you there once you finish.

Good stories but there are reading limits for the day. 5-7 "chapters" In and it won't let you continue until the next day. Really. Really. Annoying. There's an ad free option where you watch one long ad and get 15 minutes ad free. Which is helpful since otherwise the ads pop up every couple minutes. All in all, lovely app but could use some changes to make it more reader friendly.

The books are good, but WAY too many ads. If you read fast, it feels like you spend more time watching ads than you do actually reading. Also, the limits on chapters per day is ridiculous. ESPECIALLY in a time where people are stuck inside due to Covid. I love to read, and i don't know anyone that does, who would want to be limited to a few chapters a day. Unlimited? No..thats just not true

This app is great if you want to read free romance novels of any kind. There are a lot of ads though and if you can't stand grammar or spelling mistakes, I would not suggest this app. Overall a great app but the ads are kinda rediculous. This isn't approximate but it seems like there are ads every 15 minutes. Some stories also only let you read 1 chapter a day but this is not the case for all the stories

title: Message from Santa! video & call (simulated)
description:
This Christmas, amaze your children by requesting a free personalized video message or phone call from Santa Claus!

Parents, use this app together with your children to encourage good behaviour all year long!

This app has several amazing features:

VIDEO MESSAGE FROM SANTA
- choose from 3 personalized short video messages, featuring your child's details such as their name and photo*
- Premium Christmas Eve video available as in-app purchase

RECEIVE A SIMULATED PHONE CALL FROM SANTA
- Santa can call for a variety of reasons
- Santa can mention your child’s name, age and interests* during the call
- Receive unlimited calls for free*

CALL SANTA’S VOICEMAIL
- Children can record a voicemail message for Santa with their Christmas wish list
- Let Santa write down your child’s name on the naughty or nice list
- Santa tracker: find out what Santa is doing right now
- Check the weather forecast for the North Pole
- Hear the names of Santa's reindeer
- Countdown to Christmas: hear how many days are left until Christmas
- Leave a message for Santa

TEXT MESSAGE WITH SANTA
- Send Santa a message
- He will reply instantly! (simulated)


* Disclaimer: app intended for entertainment purposes only. Calls and text messages are simulated. App does not provide actual calling or texting functionality. The app can be used without paying, but some features require an in-app purchase.

"Message From Santa" and the megaphone logo are registered trademarks of First Class Media B.V., the Netherlands. All rights reserved.

comments: Was excellent until recent update made recipients impossible to edit, create, or update. I tried to edit my son's interests, but every option just quickly flashes a selection and never selects anything. Was absolutely perfect until this recent update. Now my son will wonder why Santa won't call anymore. A bit awful, not even considering the $ we paid for the app. (Galaxy Note 8: Will re-review if fixed soon)

This app sucks. Went to get this for my 5 year old daughter, and literally got 5 ads within the first minute. I havent even done anything yet. Also, I could not text in the app, couldnt add information... could not do anythingggg... be better off paying one of the homeless from the corner by a walmart to act like santa claus, than this useless app.
This was a great app, but I’ve paid to renew my premium membership, and it shows up here, but the app is saying I need to pay again. I've emailed but I've only received an auto reply.

This app is so good I like and love it so don't waste ur Mobile Data or ur Home Wifi just download this app but when am trying to tap the app it just says you need to fix ur Google Play Store so I am giving 4 stars so Toodle Toodles 😘😘😘😘😘😄
Used to be good. I have used this app for the last couple of years but for some reason now it will not let me edit my childs likes or interests.

title: Horoscopes & Tarot
description:
2020 Horoscopes and Tarot Cards
Go beyond your Daily Horoscope. This app features a wide variety of Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Annual Horoscopes, along with Zodiac Sign Compatibility and Tarot Card Readings. 

Start your day by checking out your Daily Horoscopes. You will get three each day. You can also view the current planetary positions. 

And don’t forget your daily Tarot Cards. Each day you will have access to a new Three-Card Tarot Reading. Get the deck shuffled and then select your own three cards, one each for the Past, Present and Future. 

Each week you will get a variety of Weekly Horoscopes. Along with your Weekly Overview, you’ll get individual horoscopes focusing on Career, Romance, Money and Style issues.

Plus, you will have your Monthly and Annual Horoscope to view an overall picture of what awaits you further down the road.

Interested in reading Horoscopes for other zodiac signs? You can quickly and easily access any of the 12 signs from within the app.

Daily Outlook
Looking for a quick summary of some key issues in your life? With our simple 5 star system, you get individual ratings for Money, Energy, Love and Mood. 

Zodiac Compatibility
Wondering who you are most compatible with each day? Your daily forecast tells you which zodiac sign you are being drawn towards. You can also check the compatibility ratings for any two signs.

Tarot Card Readings
Looking for insight into a particular question or issue in your life? Tarot Cards can help explain your current situation and anticipate future events. In this app you get a free daily Three-Card Tarot Reading with detailed interpretations for each card.

comments: Best among all horoscope apps, the amount of detailed forecast it gives is amazing 👌
It helps me knowing how to react to things going on thru out my day and in what context things are meant to be
You need to ask Goggle to stop posting inappropriate ads at the bottom of this app. Not something I want to see when ready my horoscope.

It was okay. I am trying to find a new horoscope app since mine closed down. This app just didn't seem personal enough and the tarot readings just seemed generalized. It didn't take into account your bday, time of birth or anything and that's pretty important in all aspects of astrology. There just isn't enough customizing to who you are on here.

This app, which is supposed to be about horoscopes (and tarot) doesn't even take into account your personal date of birth. A broad and generalised app; One size fits all. Horoscopes are most accurate when using your exact date of birth, time, and of place. This info. is the definer on your respective sign; Whether you're looking up your Chinese Zodiac, general zodiacs, compatibility, numerology, etc. What about those born on cusp? Okay if you want basic reading.

title: Camfrog: Chat Flirt Video, w/ Strangers & Friends
description:
Meet, flirt, chat with millions of members who are waiting to meet you! Be anonymous, chat with strangers, or be your true self chat to meet, flirt, and connect with people all over the world! 

Camfrog is video chat community that allows people to make new connections globally, on any compatible device! A stranger is just another friend waiting to be met, what are you waiting for? 

Camfrog provides free group video chat to meet new people and connect you with pals, peers, and find friends around the world. Join one of our thousands of group chat rooms to text, voice, and video chat live about music, politics, sports, and more — whatever your interests, there’s a world of friends ready to talk. You can also use Camfrog to have private video calls with anyone you like.

Cam up for karaoke, find friends or meet new people internationally from the comfort of your computer or mobile device. Want a private conversation? Message or video call your pals directly with our one-to-one messaging capabilities to create your private chat room.

With more than 20 years of experience in social technology and video call, Camfrog is ready to help you meet new people and find friends through live group video chats or private video calls. Download the free app and explore our chat rooms now to video chat and find friends:

-FREE: text, voice, and live video chat with friends are free with download; upgrade to view more cams, join more chat rooms simultaneously, meet more new people and find more friends. Plus, no extra fees for international messaging or video call. Whatever your budget is, video and voice chats allow you to easily meet new people and find friends on Camfrog.

-EARN REWARDS: Earn free Virtual Gifts when you complete daily streaks like going on cam in a group chat or sending gifts everyday! Watch your progress increase toward earning free gifts!

-EXCLUSIVE VIRTUAL GIFT STORE: send and receive virtual stickers and gifts exclusive to the Camfrog ecosystem, with special appearances from pop culture characters and brands you love; when you start a live group video chat or private video call, try sending gifts as an icebreaker with a hello message to meet new people and find friends. Each gift sent or received earns points toward special status as a Camfrog member.

-DYNAMIC AND ADAPTABLE: works on any device. Camfrog will even run in the background of your device if you want to listen to your favorite chat room, have a private video call or live video chat with a friend while you do something else. Never miss a great moment (or international video call) again.

-PUBLIC OR PRIVATE: for the social butterfly looking to start a live group video chat, meet new people and find friends, join one of our thousands of live group chat rooms and hop on cam for a group video call; if you want something more private, try text messaging, video calling or voice calling your pals in a private one-to-one chat room.

-INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY, LOCAL FLAVOR: whether you’re looking to meet new people, find friends, video call new friends, learn a new language, rock out to your favorite song, examine the social issues in your city elections or just start a live group video chat with like-minded people, Camfrog has a chat room for you. Can’t find a specific topic? Create a group and host your own chat room.

-UNLIMITED VIDEO: view an unlimited number of high-quality live cams in groups and rooms that interest you. Camera shy? Socialize via voice and text chat to meet new people who are live before hopping on a live group video chat or one-to-one private video call with someone.

If you like our apps, please take a moment to rate us. For bug reports or complaints, email helpdesk@camfrog.com. We read and reply to every message.

Like Us & Stay Connected!
Facebook: @Camfrog
Twitter: @Camfrog
Instagram: @CamfrogLive
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/camfrog
 
Terms of Service: http://camfrog.mobi/terms
Privacy Policy: http://camfrog.mobi/privacy

comments: Have tried on Google and Apple phones getting worse too many guys that won't leave you alone good chatting option is worthless screen sizes for the phone ridiculous. 100 2 1 finding a female without being redone by constant man I spend more time blocking and kicking off guys watching me when my profile clearly says I'm straight and just looking for females but spend more time just kicking creepers you can't even try to communicate with female for you have 10 dudes wanting to see you naked
Too many ads now popping up, and annoying volume boost when entering room.

Coming from an old user. Please fix the app asap i like using it. Thanks

comments: You remember 1942 on your Commodore C64? This is nothing like it. All enemies and bullets seem to be magnetic and you basically have no chance to 'win' this game. This is another game that's just trying to squeeze some money out of the player for exactly zero value. They even offer airplanes for $49.99. You can buy a proper game for that kind of money. Ten cents would be too much and I'm sorry for everyone spending money on this

To the developer of this game, you need to fix the score of the PvP game it is not right .No matter how you fight the opponent by looking the time and the score it suddenly the other opponent had a higher score even if you are ahead. How can you explain that sometimes the score is right and you can tell that you are losing because the end of the game its just stuck that you cant even move. Very bad pvp games.

Had 300.000 gold, 3150 gems when they just disappeared when I started playing today. Thats a big, big flaw that needs to be corrected fast. It takes some time building up alot of gems and gold. A bug like that is unacceptable. I am very disappointed. As of 3Sept cannot access PVP mode, special event mode, as well as other game play modes really???, especially when it says server not available. Your E-mail for support is not valid. Fix these bugs.

At first, the game is great. Good old 1942, however after longer play you realise how unbalanced the game & reward system are. If you don't buy blue diamonds for real money, forget about getting high quality planes/weapons. Playing long hours only gives you minimum coins or diamonds (if you buy them for coins). But the most annoying is the lucky wheel - 1 ticket costs 5000 coins and you usually (8\10) win only 10 diamonds which is minimum. Too many more negatives to mention, hence 2stars.

I love this game but this is the fourth time it has crashed on me and taken over a years worth of watching videos to build up my aircrafts. I'm guessing this is what happens when you do not spend money on the app.

title: Fieldwire - Construction Management & Punch List
description:
Get the #1 construction app for the jobsite. Fieldwire connects your entire field team, from the project manager all the way down to each specialty contractor's foreman, on one construction management platform. Making it effortless for anyone to view their drawings, schedule work and track their punch list while they are in the field.

Construction management is hard but Fieldwire is easy to deploy, learn & use every day across multiple subcontractors. Our app combines the fastest blueprint viewer on the market with a powerful task management engine, saving people time both on the jobsite and in the office.

Get started now, and join over 750,000+ construction projects who trust our construction app every day to run lean construction operations. It's so easy to use that anyone from the foreman to the project manager can be up and running in minutes, even on a large project. Our clients include owners, architects, general contractors and specialty contractors.

- FEATURES -

Drawing & blueprint app:
• Fast HD plan viewer (works offline)
• Automatic hyperlinking & OCR
• Automatic versioning with Box / Dropbox
• Automatic sheet version control
• Blueprint folders
• Markups & annotations (Clouds, text, arrow...)
• Measurements & on screen take off
• Progress photos & RFI hyperlinking
• Layered PDF blueprint export
• As built drawing archives

Lean construction scheduling app:
• Task manager with location, trade, priority and owner
• Scheduling with due dates or priorities
• Instant notifications
• Related tasks on mobile
• Track cost & manpower
• Productivity reports

Building inspection & punch list app:
• Construction inspection & checklist templates
• Progress photos with annotations & markups
• Two step verification for punchlist items
• Detailed building inspection / punch list reports
• Signature block
• Custom forms (RFI, change order, daily report, etc...)

- OTHER THINGS THAT REALLY MATTER -

• Offline mode
• Project selective sync
• Blueprint selective sync
• Push/Email notifications
• Automated reports
• Amazing customer support
• The slickest UI you can find on mobile

- YOU ARE STILL READING -

Well it's quite simple actually. We believe that we have the best construction app out there because we were in the trenches (on the jobsite) with you. Construction management needs to be tailored for the field. Last year alone, we shipped over 60 updates to make your life better on site. So get ready for the best customer service you have ever seen.

comments: Fieldwork is the best, and for me, the only way to organize and keep your jobsite and office working together in a cohesive and productive manner. There is far to many wonderful features to list in this review. Download the app and try it out for yourself and you will see. I will touch on what I feel is the most valuable feature of Fieldwire.... DOCUMENTATION. No more of the bickering of "he didn't tell me", "yes I did" etc..... ad nauseum. If its not in Fieldwire then you didnt say it. Love it

I use this app for a large scale building project and it has been very useful in keeping track of everything from diagrams to punch lists and completed tasks. I love that it is very easy to look at with simplified tabs and folders that you can filter through. It is not crowded with too much text for the 1000+ items which makes reading much more efficient. One thing I'm not a fan of is having to download all the files prior to viewing anything on the app because my device space is limited.
Great to for the whole team to use. Everyone can stay on the same page. I've only scratched the surface of this app.

I recently started using Fieldwire to manage our installation projects and see some great benefit with not only managing the overall project but the ability to have all the final paperwork, including signed documents, pictures, etc.. in one location where we can then easily close out the project. Using Fieldwire also gives us the ability to provide the customer a professional detailed recap, including pictures, of all the work we completed during the installation. Highly recommended.

A great program! Very helpful. I do wish the measuring tool was easier to use without trying to calibrate it. It should be able to select what scales the drawings are and calibrate itself. I have found myself off an inch or two while trying to calibrate it myself and suffered the consequences. In this business inches can make or break you. Overall though a really good program! Fat better than procore or others!

title: HOUND Voice Search & Personal Assistant
description:
Hound is the best way to search using your natural voice.

What do we mean by natural voice? Instead of talking like a search query "OK Hound… Find Chinese restaurants", just ask "OK Hound… What are the top rated Chinese restaurants near me?" You'll be amazed at the lightning-fast response. 

Want to try something more advanced? Hound can use follow-up questions and commands to filter, sort, or add more information to the original request. Give this a shot: "OK Hound… Find Asian restaurants rated 4 stars or more within walking distance of Times Square and exclude Chinese, Korean, and Thai"

But Hound isn't limited to restaurants and coffee shops. Use Hound to:

Search, discover, and play music:
- “OK Hound... What song is playing?”
- “OK Hound... Play the top hits by Echo & the Bunnymen”

Access Spotify with hands-free controls:
- “OK Hound… Show my Spotify playlists” 
- “OK Hound… Play my Discover Weekly playlist”
- “OK Hound… Skip to the next song”

Research and get trivia answers quickly:
- “OK Hound... When was Alexa Alemanni born?"
- “OK Hound... Tell me about the constellation Lyra"
- “OK Hound... Tell me about the Amazon River"

Set alarms and timers:
- "OK Hound… Set an alarm for 7am every weekday"
- "OK Hound… Set a timer to take out the chicken in 40 minutes"

Get the latest news:
- “OK Hound… Show me the latest news headlines”
- “OK Hound… Play me the latest news from NPR”
- “OK Hound… What is stock price of Amazon?”

Call, text, navigate handsfree:
- “OK Hound… Call Alexa at work"
- “OK Hound… Text Jeff ‘I’ll be there in five minutes’”
- “OK Hound… Show me directions to the nearest Whole Foods”

Get the weather forecast:
- “OK Hound… What’s the weather going to be like tomorrow at 6pm?
- “OK Hound… How about in Seattle in two weeks?”

Plan a night out at the movies:
- "OK Hound… What movies are playing near me around 7pm?"
- "OK Hound… What are the top action movies in theaters right now?"
- "OK Hound… What movies are playing in IMAX?"

Book an Uber:	
- "OK Hound… How much is an Uber to the airport?"
- "OK Hound… Get an Uber to the nearest movie theater"

Search for hotels and plan your travel:
- “OK Hound… Show hotels in Seattle that are pet-friendly, have a gym, and cost less than $275”

Numbers, calculations, and even mortgage estimates:
- “OK Hound… What is a prime number?”
- “OK Hound… What is the square root of 16 minus the square root of 9?”
- "OK Hound… Split a $96 bill two ways with a 15% tip"
- "OK Hound… What's the monthly payment for a $500,000 house with 20% down?"

What will you use Hound for?

Hound takes speed and accuracy to a new level thanks to our powerful Houndify platform, combining Speech Recognition and Natural Language Understanding into a single step. We call it Speech-to-Meaning (TM). Other assistants simply translate words into text, and they do a voice search the old way. But just recognizing words isn't fast enough! Hound, powered by Houndify, is the fastest and most accurate independent voice assistant in the market today.

End User Agreement: http://www.soundhound.com/hound-end-user-agreement

recentChanges:
With this new release, swipe left and you’ll find a collection of the most useful widgets to help you throughout the day.

We’ve also made it easier for you to continue to play your music where you left off. When driving with Hound In Car, quickly access your latest listening history–from music to radio to NPR news–just tap the ‘recently played’ card on top!
comments: I Like The Dashboard Its Very Easy To Click On What I Wanna See. And When I Want To Search For Something Its Found Real Quick👍

Its ok and simple enough to use to be user friendly. But its not as customizable as I would like it to be. I cant change the default search engine. I cant change the default map for directions. I cant make my own commands and connect it with other software. It also doesnt hold a conversation well enough. For 2020 Im expecting today's AI assistants to far surpass the ones from ten years ago and to be atleast as customizable as Saiy was. the UI is snappy and easy to use. Keep working on it.
"Play my music" does not play my local music files.

I love that it has lyrics to the songs! I would totally give this a 5 star rating, but for some reason, every time I try to get into one of my Spotify playlists on it, the app quits working and all my playlists disappear.
It's better than a Google sometimes like when you ask how to spell something it's much better than Google When I asked how to spell $185.25 Google you cannot bring it

title: TalkLife for Anxiety, Depression & Stress
description:
TalkLife is all about support. Our community is full of people who have also felt alone, battled depression or living with anxiety and needed somewhere safe to talk. TalkLife is a positive community where people have real conversations about how they feel - lonely, misunderstood, unhappy, or actually feeling alright. 

People use TalkLife to seek support for the bad times, but also celebrate the good ones. You, your thoughts, your feelings are important - don't keep them bottled up. You can even vent anonymously. 

You may feel bad now, but you're not alone, and there are better times ahead. TalkLife is here for you through the shiny and the muck, and they can really lift you. Download TalkLife and say hello. 

Download TalkLife and you can safely talk about any struggles and reach support across many areas including, anxiety, self-harm, living with depression, self harm, loneliness, PTSD, bipolar, suicidal thoughts, and many more. 

*Please note, if you are in a crisis situation, please seek emergency support as soon as possible. Peer support should not be used if you are in an emergency situation.

recentChanges:
+ Added the ability to filter groups by topic.
+ Fixed lag loading on public group settings page.
+ Fixed crash on public groups.
+ Fixed notification drop down.
+ Fixed a few bugs & crashes.
comments: I've only been on for a less than an hour and I uninstalled. I can't stand the creepy/inappropriate comments. Honestly made me feel worse. The ads are annoying and the filters are so limited. I want to filter based on country and multiple age groups. I do not like how all the categories are merged together on my feed. I wanted to find a safe space to escape the toxicity on other social media sites and this is just as bad.

For the moment, you can actually converse with people. It's not flooded with bots, OF/IG farmers, or the casual hook-up crowd. There are edgelords, but for the moment.... It's great. Said after spending 10+ hours of near continual usage on the app. Further, in that time the mods/admins were active in discussing community issues, and pending changes in an open posting. Refreshing, and grateful that I stumbled across TalkLife. Keep it secret, keep it safe. ;)

Few things annoy me about it (full page ads every so often, not non stop though but they are hard to exit out of), can't quickly scroll to the top of a page and can't set unique backgrounds for a post. All in all though, a good, helpful app!

I'm using this app for 5 months and it helped me in a lot way, like making friends, taking care of my mental health and helping people. And the new update is so cool. Especially the groups we can moderate our own group and publicize it. So happy to see a community growing and being a part of it.

Im not saying this is a replacement for seeing a psychiatrist. But for peoplelike me sometimes its good to express yourself in a healthy way and receive support. This app honestly helped me stop crying and smile for the first time in a long time.

title: Torque Pro (OBD 2 & Car)
description:
See what your car is doing in realtime, get OBD fault codes, car performance, sensor data and more!

Torque is a vehicle / car performance / diagnostics tool and scanner that uses an OBD II Bluetooth adapter to connect to your OBD2 engine management / ECU

Layout your own dashboard with the widgets / gauges you want!

It can use the GPS to provide tracker logs with OBD engine logging so you can see what you were doing at any point in time

It can also show and reset a DTC / CEL / fault code like a scantool. Helps you fix your car and helps keep repair costs down!

Torque also features:

* Dyno / Dynomometer and Horsepower/HP & Torque
* Can read Transmission Temperatures (vehicle dependant)
* 0-60 speed timings - more accurate than just using plain old GPS - see how fast your car is (or truck )
* CO2 emissions readout
* Customisable dashboard & profiles
* Video your journey using the Track Recorder plugin with onscreen OBDII data overlay - a black box for your car/truck!
* Automatically send GPS tagged tweets directly to twitter (for example if you are going on a road trip)
* Massive fault code database for lookup of fault codes from different manufacturers
* Theme support (choose from different themes to change the look of your dashboard)
* Send logging information to web or email CSV/KML for analysis via excel / openoffice reader
* Heads up display / HUD mode for night time driving
* Compass (GPS Based) that won't suffer magnetic interference
* GPS Speedometer/Tracking and realtime web upload capability - see what you were doing and your engine, at a point in time
* Turbo boost feature for vehicles that support MAP and MAF sensors (VW & Golf / Audi / Seat etc supported)
* Alarms and warnings (for example if your coolant temperature goes over 120C whilst driving) with voice/speech overlay
* Car dock support
* Graph data
* MPG
* Able to share screenshots to Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Email, etc
* AIDL API for third party apps, A simple Telnet interface for developers to talk to the adapter, and an OBD scanner.
* Works on tablet devices like the Motorola Xoom, Dell Streak, Samsung Galaxy Tab and Nook

Works on any vehicle that uses the OBD 2 standard (most vehicles built after 2000, but can work for vehicles as far back as 1996) if in doubt check with your manufacturer first or look for 'OBD2' on written on a big white label in your engine bay

Works on vehicles made by Ford, VW, GM/Vauxhall/Opel, Chrysler, Mercedes, Volkswagen, Audi, Jaguar, Citroen, Peugoet, Skoda, Kia, Mazda, Lexus, Subaru, Renault, Mitsubishi, Nissan, Honda, Hyundai, BMW, Toyota, Seat, Dodge, Jeep, Pontiac and many more vehicle makes, European, US, Far East, etc. Some vehicle ECUs may support more/less features than others

The app needs a Bluetooth OBD2 adapter to work. The adapter is small and plugs into the diagnostics socket on the car which gives your phone access. You can find a list of adapters on: http://torque-bhp.com/wiki/Bluetooth_Adapters (Garmin EcoRoute HD adapters not supported)

If you buy one of the cheap china OBD2 ELM327 bluetooth adapters from ebay / amazon, then make sure you have a good returns policy with the seller 

Some of the best reliable OBD2 / OBD adapters are the Scantool.net adapter, the OBDKey, and PLX Devices, OBDLink, Bluetooth, ELM327 and other adapters are supported - search on google for them

More features added every release - there are forums at http://torque-bhp.com/forums/ - if you want something added then let me know and I'll try to add it if it is possible! Vehicle ECUs vary in the amount of sensors supported

*PLEASE NOTE* Any reports of hanging or reboots after quitting the app is due to a bug in HTC devices and Galaxy Tab,this can be triggered by using the Pandora/Vlingo/Other BT apps. Disabling Pandoras new bluetooth settings fixes the problem, but HTC/Samsung need to release a fix.Please contact their support and request a fix,Thanks!

Changelog: 
http://torque-bhp.com/forums/?wpforumaction=viewtopic&t=3.0

* Can read Transmission Temperatures (vehicle dependant)
* 0-60 speed timings - more accurate than just using plain old GPS - see how fast your car is (or truck )
* CO2 emissions readout
* Customisable dashboard & profiles
* Video your journey using the Track Recorder plugin with onscreen OBDII data overlay - a black box for your car/truck!
* Automatically send GPS tagged tweets directly to twitter (for example if you are going on a road trip)
* Massive fault code database for lookup of fault codes from different manufacturers
* Theme support (choose from different themes to change the look of your dashboard)
* Send logging information to web or email CSV/KML for analysis via excel / openoffice reader
* Heads up display / HUD mode for night time driving
* Compass (GPS Based) that won't suffer magnetic interference
* GPS Speedometer/Tracking and realtime web upload capability - see what you were doing and your engine, at a point in time
* Turbo boost feature for vehicles that support MAP and MAF sensors (VW & Golf / Audi / Seat etc supported)
* Alarms and warnings (for example if your coolant temperature goes over 120C whilst driving) with voice/speech overlay
* Car dock support
* Graph data
* MPG
* Able to share screenshots to Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Email, etc
* AIDL API for third party apps, A simple Telnet interface for developers to talk to the adapter, and an OBD scanner.
* Works on tablet devices like the Motorola Xoom, Dell Streak, Samsung Galaxy Tab and Nook

Works on any vehicle that uses the OBD 2 standard (most vehicles built after 2000, but can work for vehicles as far back as 1996) if in doubt check with your manufacturer first or look for 'OBD2' on written on a big white label in your engine bay

Works on vehicles made by Ford, VW, GM/Vauxhall/Opel, Chrysler, Mercedes, Volkswagen, Audi, Jaguar, Citroen, Peugoet, Skoda, Kia, Mazda, Lexus, Subaru, Renault, Mitsubishi, Nissan, Honda, Hyundai, BMW, Toyota, Seat, Dodge, Jeep, Pontiac and many more vehicle makes, European, US, Far East, etc. Some vehicle ECUs may support more/less features than others

The app needs a Bluetooth OBD2 adapter to work. The adapter is small and plugs into the diagnostics socket on the car which gives your phone access. You can find a list of adapters on: http://torque-bhp.com/wiki/Bluetooth_Adapters (Garmin EcoRoute HD adapters not supported)

If you buy one of the cheap china OBD2 ELM327 bluetooth adapters from ebay / amazon, then make sure you have a good returns policy with the seller

Some of the best reliable OBD2 / OBD adapters are the Scantool.net adapter, the OBDKey, and PLX Devices, OBDLink, Bluetooth, ELM327 and other adapters are supported - search on google for them

More features added every release - there are forums at http://torque-bhp.com/forums/ - if you want something added then let me know and I'll try to add it if it is possible! Vehicle ECUs vary in the amount of sensors supported

*PLEASE NOTE* Any reports of hanging or reboots after quitting the app is due to a bug in HTC devices and Galaxy Tab,this can be triggered by using the Pandora/Vlingo/Other BT apps. Disabling Pandoras new bluetooth settings fixes the problem, but HTC/Samsung need to release a fix.Please contact their support and request a fix,Thanks!

Changelog:
http://torque-bhp.com/forums/?wpforumaction=viewtopic&t=3.0
summary:
Measure BHP, Torque & 0-60
Clear car OBD faults
View engine data in Google Earth

recentChanges: * Fixes for Android 11 crash
comments: I've been a long term user of Torque Lite. The time has come to purchase the full version. Initially I've seen it as a tribute to author's dedication to create something so useful (I was fully content with even the limited usability of the lite version). After installing the Pro version I've realized it's a completely different app with absolutely amazing functionalities. Thumbs up for the author!

EDIT: finally, belatedly, the issues with this app blocking its use on Android 11 are fixed. Aside from the long delay in fixing this, it is very useful albeit with some questionable UI decisions. On balance it gets five stars, just, because of the number of OBD features it supports out of the box, but some sort of UI update would be nice. Feature support is outstanding, much better than most.

Always running in the background! Almost expect to see apps mining data in the background if they are free, but not when they cost. Does the same as many other free apps I've used, but slower. Really not impressed considering this app costs money, and was hoping to get away from the extra battery usage and invasion of privacy of free apps. Guess I should've just got a free one again.

From great to nah in 2.9 seconds. Used to be a great, now it doesn't work. It won't connect to OBD2 scanner anymore. Tried it on different cars thinking that maybe my old scanner died and nothing. Got a new scanner and wouldn't connect to it either. I decided to try a different app and everything worked on the other app. What are you doing? This was a great app and you let it fall. Pick it up and make it great again. Note 10+

For the most part I like it but even with the paid version there are tons of issues or bugs. Making dashboards would be cool if they would ever keep thier position after a few restarts. It likes to continue running in the background even after manually exiting it and after no more connection to the odb2 dongle.. and it doesn't always work the first or even second time opening it. Fails to connect or hangs. When it works right, it is pretty great.

title: CareZone
description:
CareZone is the easiest way for you and your family to manage medications and doctor’s instructions.

Managing prescriptions is hard work. We’ll make sure you always have an up to date list of your or your loved one’s medications, and that you’re staying on top of instructions given to you after diagnosis, treatment or discharge. 

Always have a medication list with you.
Quickly create a detailed medications list, which is securely backed up and accessible from any mobile device or browser at the clinic, in an emergency, or any other time you need it.

Reminders help you stay on schedule.
Schedule when you, or a family member, is supposed to take each dose and we’ll send reminders to you, your family, or anyone you choose that it’s time to take medicines. Don’t forget to schedule reminders for refilling prescriptions!

Organize important info in one place.
We’ll also help organize the mountain of personal information you’re challenged to manage in healthcare situations — from reaction journals and care calendars to medical contacts and insurance information. 

FEATURES
• Medication Management:  Keep a single list of medications, dosages, refill information, and prescribing docs in your pocket.
• Trackers:  Record important health vitals and track progress over time — such as Blood Glucose, Sleep, Weight, and more!
• Contacts:  Organize important contacts — doctors, pharmacies, insurance, family, and helpers.
• Sharing:  Safely share access with others in case of an emergency, or to coordinate care.
• Journal:  Keep a journal to record observations and share updates.
• Calendar:  Keep track of appointments and refill dates.
• To-Dos:  Organize and assign tasks to others. If you need help, we’ll find volunteers from within your family for you.
• Photos & Files:  Securely upload and store photos, or important health files, directly from your phone.
• Notes:  Jot down everything you’d otherwise squirrel away in a desk drawer.

Your info is private and secure. We promise. 
Your data is protected using the same techniques as your bank, and security firms routinely audit our systems to ensure everything is safe. 

The info you store at CareZone is also available via web browsers at CareZone.com, and via other mobile devices.

recentChanges:
New! You can now add Tracker target ranges for A1C, Blood Glucose, Blood Pressure (including Pulse) and Weight. You can also scroll through and zoom in on Tracker graph data for a more detailed view.

comments: Used to be a 5star app. Now you can no longer take photos of your meds to add them. All manual entry. Nothing like taking a great app and going backwards. Like the way it tracks and reminds me of tracking times.

I find this app somewhat difficult to use for making changes to schedules. Overall I like it for the reminders and the information it puts at my fingertips. I'll keep using it and learning how to navigate within it.
Used this for years. For some reason they did away with the entry from photo method. Will give 5 stars when you bring that back. Why would you do away with such a vital feature?
No customer support or email response. App has been stuck on uploading photos for 5 DAYS even after unistalling and reinstalling.
Disappointed Long-term User when the photo input vanished. Looking for a replacement now.

title: Downsyndroom - Gratis demo
description:
Uitgebreide medische informatie over het downsyndroom. Informatie over uiteenlopende onderwerpen. Een praktische vraagbaak voor ouders, verzorgers en behandelaars.

Let op! Dit is de gratis versie en geeft beperkt toegang tot een selectie van de hoofdstukken van het boekje. Steun Artsen voor Kinderen en koop de complete versie van de app.

Een kind met Downsyndroom heeft vaak extra zorg nodig. Veel kinderen worden namelijk geboren met medische problemen. Als ouder wil je graag weten welke problemen je kunt verwachten, en ook wat je eraan kunt doen.

Met deze applicatie kun je voor iedere leeftijdsfase, snel en overzichtelijk de meest voorkomende medische problemen opzoeken. Vanaf de eerste levensmaand tot en met de tienerjaren. Met gedegen medische informatie wordt ook de complexe medische problematiek inzichtelijk gemaakt. Waardoor de stappen van de kinderarts en andere behandelaars goed kunnen worden gevolgd.

De nieuwste medisch ontwikkelingen worden via regelmatige updates bijgehouden.

Deze app is ontwikkeld door de Stichting Artsen voor Kinderen en staat onder redactie van een team van medische specialisten.

De medische verantwoording ligt bij dr. Michel Weijerman, kinderarts en voormalig coördinator van de Downpoli van het VU medisch centrum in Amsterdam.

Deze app gaat uit van de nieuwste multidisciplinaire richtlijn voor de medische begeleiding van kinderen met Downsyndroom.

De technische realisatie van deze app is verzorgd door BioMedia Amsterdam.

This text twist word game is really challenging and fun. Enjoy modern word puzzles with the best crosswords.  

You will never feel bored after you play this word puzzle game! Try it once and you won’t be able to put it down, extremely addictive! 

➤ Escape and relax your mind by entering to the beautiful scenes of Word Calm! 
➤ Start with over 1200 levels 
➤ Challenge your brain and expand your vocabulary 
 ➤ Think you are ready for it? They start easy but ramp up fast!  

Word Calm is the word puzzle game that over 100000+ people loves to play! It's a perfect game for fans of crossword or word anagram games, combining best of word find games and crossword puzzles.

I play alot of word games, I just added this one to my collection my spelling has improved greatly! And my vocabulary has improved to. I havn't played it long but I can already tell that it was worth downloading.
This used to be a really good game until they added another game within. You have to play the other game even if you don't want to. It now sucks.
I just want to say that this app of a game is very relaxing and fun. There are ads but they're not so bad. Overall, I am enjoying Word Calm.

title: Preschool Adventures-2
description:
Let's teach your preschooler kid numbers, counting, letters, colors, shapes, animals, logic and more.

" Preschool Adventures-2 " contains 36 puzzles in 4 fun, colorful, and educational sections, specifically designed to contribute to your child's cognitive skills, exercise abstract thinking abilities, and develop general knowledge. Developing these abilities and skills can help prepare your children for school and give them extra advantage in life.

Preschool Adventures-2 is a wonderful game with educational puzzles for 4-5-year old kids.
The game is available in 12 languages: English, Germany, Spanish, Russian, French, Italy ,Portuguese and more..

This is the best game for your preschool children to learn with a lot of fun .The game is suitable for little girls and little boys alike.

While playing the game your child will learn:
✔ Counting from 1 to 10
✔ Completing a missing part of an image
✔ Matching objects according to "depends on", "is opposite to", and "is a kind of" 
    logical relations
✔ Bilateral and spatial awareness (above, below, left-to, right-to, behind, in front of)
✔ Recognizing an object by its silhouette (shadow)
✔ Letters and their pronunciations
✔ Animal foods and habitats names

The game includes the appropriate sounds of animals, birds, instruments, etc. These (and other) sound effects are played on each correct answer.

♥ All the puzzles were prepared by a specialist in the field of child mental 
   development.
♥ The game was tested on dozens of children in the appropriate age range prior to its 
    release.

Install "Preschool Adventures-2" today and let your kid have fun and free learning !
